snippet: An early look at the state of this year’s auctions, through the prism of a long-standing industry league.
abstract: An early look at the state of this year’s auctions, through the prism of a long-standing industry league.
lead_paragraph: I traveled to Phoenix last weekend to participate in L.A.B.R., a prominent industry league that has been around for 19 years. I was in the N.L.-only league, which is extremely deep, with 13 participants and 10 pitching slots to fill. Here are the full results, and here’s my roster:

headline.main: Fantasy Focus: One Man’s N.L.-Only Roster
